mapper.select: SELECT Limit1.MEM_ID MEM_ID , Limit1.ORG_CODE ORG_CODE , CASE WHEN ( Limit1.MEMBERID1 IS NOT NULL ) THEN Limit1.MEMBERCODE1 ELSE '' END C1 , CASE WHEN ( Limit1.MEMBERID1 IS NOT NULL ) THEN Limit1.NAME1 ELSE '' END C2 , CASE WHEN ( Limit1.TELMOBILE1 IS NOT NULL ) THEN Limit1.TELMOBILE1 ELSE '' END C3 , Limit1.GRP_CODE GRP_CODE , CASE WHEN ( Limit1.MEMBERID2 IS NOT NULL ) THEN Limit1.MEMBERCODE2 ELSE '' END C4 , CASE WHEN ( Limit1.MEMBERID2 IS NOT NULL ) THEN Limit1.NAME2 ELSE '' END C5 , CASE WHEN ( Limit1.MEMBERID2 IS NOT NULL ) THEN Limit1.TELMOBILE2 ELSE '' END C6 , Limit1.DEPT_CODE DEPT_CODE , CASE WHEN ( Limit1.MEMBERID3 IS NOT NULL ) THEN Limit1.MEMBERCODE3 ELSE '' END C7 , CASE WHEN ( Limit1.MEMBERID3 IS NOT NULL ) THEN Limit1.NAME3 ELSE '' END C8 , CASE WHEN ( Limit1.TELMOBILE3 IS NOT NULL ) THEN Limit1.TELMOBILE3 ELSE '' END C9 , Limit1.MEM_CODE MEM_CODE , Limit1.NAME NAME , Limit1.TEL_MOBILE TEL_MOBILE , Limit1.TEL_HUSE TEL_HUSE , Limit1.NRIC NRIC , Limit1.TEL_OFFICE TEL_OFFICE , Limit1.MEM_TYPE MEM_TYPE FROM ( SELECT Extent1.DEPT_CODE DEPT_CODE , Extent1.GRP_CODE GRP_CODE , Extent1.ORG_CODE ORG_CODE , Extent2.MEM_ID MEM_ID , Extent2.MEM_CODE MEM_CODE , Extent2.MEM_TYPE MEM_TYPE , Extent2.NAME NAME , Extent2.NRIC NRIC , Extent2.TEL_OFFICE TEL_OFFICE , Extent2.TEL_HUSE TEL_HUSE , Extent2.TEL_MOBILE TEL_MOBILE , Extent3.MEM_ID MEMBERID1 , Extent3.MEM_CODE MEMBERCODE1 , Extent3.NAME NAME1 , Extent3.TEL_MOBILE TELMOBILE1 , Extent4.MEM_ID MEMBERID2 , Extent4.MEM_CODE MEMBERCODE2 , Extent4.NAME NAME2 , Extent4.TEL_MOBILE TELMOBILE2 , Extent5.MEM_ID MEMBERID3 , Extent5.MEM_CODE MEMBERCODE3 , Extent5.NAME NAME3 , Extent5.TEL_MOBILE TELMOBILE3 FROM ( SELECT vMemberOrg.MEM_ID MEM_ID , vMemberOrg.MEM_CODE MEM_CODE , vMemberOrg.MEM_LVL MEM_LVL , vMemberOrg.DEPT_CODE DEPT_CODE , vMemberOrg.GRP_CODE GRP_CODE , vMemberOrg.ORG_CODE ORG_CODE , vMemberOrg.TOP_ORG_CODE TOP_ORG_CODE , vMemberOrg.MEM_UP_ID MEM_UP_ID , vMemberOrg.LVL3_UP_ID LVL3_UP_ID , vMemberOrg.LVL2_UP_ID LVL2_UP_ID , vMemberOrg.LVL1_UP_ID LVL1_UP_ID , vMemberOrg.LVL0_UP_ID LVL0_UP_ID FROM ORG1001V vMemberOrg ) Extent1 JOIN ORG0001D Extent2 ON Extent2.MEM_ID = Extent1.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D Extent3 ON Extent3.MEM_ID = Extent1.LVL1_UP_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D Extent4 ON Extent4.MEM_ID = Extent1.LVL2_UP_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D Extent5 ON Extent5.MEM_ID = Extent1.LVL3_UP_ID WHERE Extent1.MEM_ID = #{memberCode} AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) Limit1

SELECT Limit1.CMPLNC_NO CMPLNC_NO FROM ( SELECT Extent3.CMPLNC_NO CMPLNC_NO FROM SAL0001D Extent1 JOIN MSC0006D Extent2 ON Extent2.CMPLNC_SO_ID = Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN MSC0005D Extent3 ON Extent3.CMPLNC_ID = Extent2.CMPLNC_ID WHERE ( 8 <> Extent2.CMPLNC_STUS_ID ) AND ( Extent1.SALES_ORD_NO = #{orderNo} ) AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) Limit1

SELECT Limit1.SALES_ORD_ID SALES_ORD_ID , Limit1.SALES_ORD_NO SALES_ORD_NO , Limit1.SALES_DT C1 , Limit1.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME , Limit1.STK_DESC STK_DESC , Limit1.NAME NAME , Limit1.NAME1 NAME1 , Limit1.NRIC NRIC , Limit1.MEM_ID MEM_ID FROM ( SELECT Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID SALES_ORD_ID , Extent1.SALES_ORD_NO SALES_ORD_NO , Extent1.SALES_DT SALES_DT , Extent1.MEM_ID MEM_ID , Extent3.STK_DESC STK_DESC , Extent4.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME , Extent5.NAME NAME , Extent6.NAME NAME1 , Extent6.NRIC NRIC FROM SAL0001D Extent1 JOIN SAL0002D Extent2 ON Extent2.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN SYS0026M Extent3 ON Extent3.STK_ID = Extent2.ITM_STK_ID JOIN SYS0013M Extent4 ON Extent4.CODE_ID = Extent1.APP_TYPE_ID JOIN SYS0038M Extent5 ON Extent5.STUS_CODE_ID = Extent1.STUS_CODE_ID JOIN SAL0029D Extent6 ON Extent6.CUST_ID = Extent1.CUST_ID WHERE Extent1.SALES_ORD_NO = #{orderNo} AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) Limit1

SELECT Extent1.CMPLNC_ID CMPLNC_ID , Extent1.CMPLNC_NO CMPLNC_NO , Extent1.MEM_ID MEM_ID , Extent1.CMPLNC_STUS_ID CMPLNC_STUS_ID , Extent1.CMPLNC_REM CMPLNC_REM , Extent1.CMPLNC_CRT_DT CMPLNC_CRT_DT , Extent1.CMPLNC_CRT_USER_ID CMPLNC_CRT_USER_ID , Extent1.CMPLNC_UPD_DT CMPLNC_UPD_DT , Extent1.CMPLNC_UPD_USER_ID CMPLNC_UPD_USER_ID FROM MSC0005D Extent1 WHERE Extent1.CMPLNC_ID = #{complianceId} AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT Extent1.CMPLNC_ID CMPLNC_ID , Extent2.SALES_ORD_ID SALES_ORD_ID , Extent2.SALES_ORD_NO SALES_ORD_NO , TO_CHAR(Extent2.SALES_DT,'DD-MM-YYYY') C1 , Extent5.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME , Extent4.STK_DESC STK_DESC , Extent6.NAME NAME , Extent7.NAME NAME1 , Extent7.NRIC NRIC , Extent2.MEM_ID MEM_ID FROM MSC0006D Extent1 JOIN SAL0001D Extent2 ON Extent2.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent1.CMPLNC_SO_ID JOIN SAL0002D Extent3 ON Extent3.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent2.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN SYS0026M Extent4 ON Extent4.STK_ID = Extent3.ITM_STK_ID JOIN SYS0013M Extent5 ON Extent5.CODE_ID = Extent2.APP_TYPE_ID JOIN SYS0038M Extent6 ON Extent6.STUS_CODE_ID = Extent2.STUS_CODE_ID JOIN SAL0029D Extent7 ON Extent7.CUST_ID = Extent2.CUST_ID WHERE ( 1 = Extent1.CMPLNC_STUS_ID ) AND ( Extent1.CMPLNC_ID = #{complianceId} )

SELECT Extent1.CMPLNC_ID CMPLNC_ID , Extent2.NAME NAME , Extent4.RESN_DESC RESN_DESC , Extent3.NAME NAME1 , Extent1.CMPLNC_COLCT_AMT CMPLNC_COLCT_AMT , Extent1.CMPLNC_REM CMPLNC_REM , Extent5.USER_NAME USER_NAME , TO_CHAR(Extent1.CMPLNC_CRT_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd') C1 , CASE WHEN ( 1 = Extent1.CMPLNC_HAS_ATTACH ) THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END C2 , Extent1.CMPLNC_ATTACH_FILE_NAME CMPLNC_ATTACH_FILE_NAME, Extent1.CMPLNC_ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID CMPLNC_ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID FROM MSC0007D Extent1 LEFT JOIN SYS0038M Extent2 ON Extent2.STUS_CODE_ID = Extent1.CMPLNC_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M Extent3 ON Extent3.STUS_CODE_ID = Extent1.CMPLNC_ACTN_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0032M Extent4 ON Extent4.RESN_ID = Extent1.CMPLNC_FOLW_UP_ID JOIN SYS0047M Extent5 ON Extent5.USER_ID = Extent1.CMPLNC_CRT_USER_ID WHERE Extent1.CMPLNC_ID = #{complianceId}

SELECT Extent1.CMPLNC_ITM_ID CMPLNC_ITM_ID , Extent1.CMPLNC_ID CMPLNC_ID , Extent1.CMPLNC_SO_ID CMPLNC_SO_ID , Extent1.CMPLNC_STUS_ID CMPLNC_STUS_ID , Extent1.CMPLNC_REM CMPLNC_REM FROM MSC0006D Extent1 WHERE ( Extent1.CMPLNC_ID = #{complianceId} ) AND ( Extent1.CMPLNC_SO_ID = #{orderNo} ) AND ( 1 = Extent1.CMPLNC_STUS_ID ) AND ROWNUM <= 1
mapper.update: UPDATE MSC0005D SET CMPLNC_UPD_DT = sysdate, CMPLNC_STUS_ID = #{complianceStatusId}, CMPLNC_UPD_USER_ID = #{complianceUpdateBy} WHERE ( CMPLNC_ID = #{complianceId} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSC0007D ( CMPLNC_ITM_ID , CMPLNC_ID , CMPLNC_SO_ID , CMPLNC_STUS_ID , CMPLNC_ACTN_ID , CMPLNC_FOLW_UP_ID , CMPLNC_RCIV_DT , CMPLNC_CLOS_DT , CMPLNC_REM , CMPLNC_CASE_CTGRY , CMPLNC_DOC_TYPE , CMPLNC_FINDING , CMPLNC_COLCT_AMT , CMPLNC_FINAL_ACTN , CMPLNC_HAS_ATTACH , CMPLNC_ATTACH_FILE_NAME , CMPLNC_CRT_DT , CMPLNC_CRT_USER_ID , CMPLNC_PERSON_IN_CHRG ) VALUES ( MSC0007D_CMPLNC_ITM_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL , 0 , #{complianceSOID} , 0 , #{complianceActionId} , #{complianceFollowUpId} , NULL , NULL , #{complianceRemark} , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , 0 , NULL , sysdate , #{complianceCreateBy} , NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT Filter3.CMPLNC_SO_ID CMPLNC_SO_ID FROM ( SELECT Extent1.CMPLNC_SO_ID CMPLNC_SO_ID FROM MSC0006D Extent1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT Extent2.CMPLNC_ID CMPLNC_ID FROM MSC0006D Extent2 WHERE ( Extent2.CMPLNC_SO_ID =#{orderId} ) AND ( 1 = Extent2.CMPLNC_STUS_ID ) AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) Project1 ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT Extent3.CMPLNC_ID CMPLNC_ID FROM MSC0006D Extent3 WHERE ( Extent3.CMPLNC_SO_ID = #{orderId} ) AND ( 1 = Extent3.CMPLNC_STUS_ID ) AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) Project2 ON 1 = 1 WHERE ( 1 = Extent1.CMPLNC_STUS_ID ) AND ( Extent1.CMPLNC_ID = (CASE WHEN ( Project1.CMPLNC_ID IS NULL ) THEN 0 ELSE Project2.CMPLNC_ID END) ) ) Filter3 JOIN ( SELECT Extent4.SALES_ORD_ID SALESORDERID1 , Limit3.CUST_ID CUSTOMERID1 FROM SAL0001D Extent4 JOIN ( SELECT Extent5.CUST_ID CUST_ID FROM SAL0001D Extent5 WHERE Extent5.SALES_ORD_ID = #{orderId} AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) Limit3 ON Extent4.CUST_ID = Limit3.CUST_ID ) Join3 ON Join3.SALESORDERID1 = Filter3.CMPLNC_SO_ID WHERE Filter3.CMPLNC_SO_ID <> #{orderId}
